chargeHist.descr: Sex with Child Age 16 or Older

result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua J Reeverts was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex with Child Age 16 or Older, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.09.
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

civilJdgmts.propDescr: Civil judgment for unpaid court obligations

supervisions.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution to victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

11:08 am   TO INCLUDE 14CF141, 14CF206, 14CF217, 14CM193, 14CM222, 14CM244, 14CT244, 14CT126, 14CT136, 14TR503 & 14TR1045
Defendant Joshua J Reeverts in court with attorney Liesl E. Nelson.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Thorie:  plea agreement is: 14CF206: file amended information amending the Burg to simple Burglary.  14CM206 3 year DPA - comply with probation.  3 yr DJOC on 14CF141 - forgery charge - 3 yrs - comply with probation,  14CM193 - plead to Ct 1 4th deg sex assault - dismiss Ct 2,  14CT126 OWI 1st with minor - plea guilty to that charge   14CM222 - guilty to Ct 1(NOW CORRECTED TO CT 2, dismissing remainder of charges).  DRI but read-in for restitution - all dismissed cases should be read-in and dismissed for restitution purposes.   RE:  14CM222 - plea questionnaire has him pleading to Ct 2, not 1      14CF217: def to plead guilty to Ct 2, 4th deg sex assault and Ct 3 - dismiss remaing charges.  14TR503 - dismissed, 14CT136 dismissed, 14CF139 dismissed, 14CM244 dismissed, and 14TR1045 dismissed:  SUMMARY: 2 DJOCS, 5 MISD CTS, MAX PROBATION 3 YEARS.  s/w probation 3 years on 5 misd.  DJOCs conc.  NO JAIL RECOMMENDATION unless Court feels necessary.  Treatment and counseling be addressed by probation and parole.  Restitution to be determined within 30 days.  DEF PLEADS GUILTY.  Def is 18. Constitutional rights explained to defendant  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights.  Def pleads guilty to 14CF141 Forgery.  Nelson stips to facts. Nelson stips to the facts.    COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty of Burglary in 14CF206, but JOC will not be entered at this time.  14CF217 Def pleads guilty to Ct 2 sexual intercourse with a child.  Nelson stips to the facts.    COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS. COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY,  INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty of Ct 3 theft.  14CM193: Def pleads guilty to Ct 1 4th deg sex assault.  Nelson stips to the facts.    COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty of 4th degree sex assault. COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty if Ct 2.   14CT126 - Def pleads guilty to OWI with minor child. COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty of OWI with minor child
DISMISSALS:  14CF217, Ct 1, 4 & 5 DRI.  14CM193, Ct 2 DRI, 14CM222,  Cts 1,3,4 & 5 DRI, 14CM244 AND 14CT136, AND 14CF139 are dismissed.  Traffic citations are dismissed.
